name: Cohen Carlisle
bio: I love Elixir for its productivity, elegant syntax, and functional nature. I've written it professionally and for fun. I hope to help people get excited about Elixir and learn some things myself, as well.

name: Brian Underwood
bio: I'm a long-time full-stack web developer with a particular interest in different ways to store and process data.  I'm a huge fan how Elixir makes functional programming and fault tolerance accessible and am excited to help others.

name: Chris Eyre
bio: I'm a long-time full-stack web developer in a range of languages. I mentor Elixir to allow me to teach and learn from the students.

name: Raphael Costa
bio: I'm an Engineer/Teacher using Elixir at my day job and in my side projects as well. I gave talks on Elixir and functional programming at some events, one of them being ElixirConf EU.
